title: Growth of infant behaviour: Later stages
creator_credit: Arnold Gesell and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: A demonstration of the increasing ability of the growing infant to use his hands in manipulating objects. Shows the definite and predictable stages by which the hand grows from an almost useless organ to the dextrous and sensitive instrument of the human will.
description: A demonstration of the increasing ability of the growing infant to use his hands in manipulating objects. Shows the definite and predictable stages by which the hand grows from an almost useless organ to the dextrous and sensitive instrument of the human will.
